pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## ClickHouse ConnectA suite of Python packages for connecting Python to ClickHouse:* Pandas DataFrames* Numpy Arrays* PyArrow Tables* SQLAlchemy 1.3 and 1.4 (limited feature set)* Apache Superset 1.4+### Warning -- ZStd errors with versions 0.5.21 and belowVersions prior to 0.5.22 are not compatible with urllib3 version 2+ when using zstd compression. If you encountersuch errors please upgrade to clickhouse-connect 0.5.22+ or downgrade your urllib3 version to 1.x### Complete DocumentationThe documentation for ClickHouse Connect has moved to[ClickHouse Docs](https://clickhouse.com/docs/en/integrations/language-clients/python/intro) ### Installation```pip install clickhouse-connect```ClickHouse Connect requires Python 3.7 or higher.
